easy.title: Two Sum
easy.desc: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

medium.title: Two Sum ( Medium )
medium.desc: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.
